subject: Sports Injuries
Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Some found humor in the 1989 Eagles-Cowboys games, which came to be known as the Bounty Bowls, which underscores how much attitudes about N.F.L. player safety have changed.
snippet: Some found humor in the 1989 Eagles-Cowboys games, which came to be known as the Bounty Bowls, which underscores how much attitudes about N.F.L. player safety have changed.
